Which class does the URLencoding in heritrix ?

it looks like URLs like:
http://www.bs.dk/showfile.aspx?IdGuid={B0A}

gets encoded to:
http://www.bs.dk/showfile.aspx?IdGuid=%7BBOA%7D

my browser (IE) does not encode '{}' automatically so when my browser wants access such URI's they are not found in my archive unless I 
encode the braces myself. Because of this I want to use the heritrix URLencoding Class to ensure consistency between what heritrix has 
encoded and what my proxyserver encodes before looking URIs up in my archive.

best
